comments.body: Why is this list so much longer than the one of RN? https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/0d753f7c4c38f158613c7b0d22a554900a09afc7/types/react-native/index.d.ts#L3-L23

Because the last one is me ;) and the rest are from the actual types contributors from `react-native-maps` types - their `index.d.ts`.

I‚Äôve proposed to them already moving this to @types; before they process my PR with them to remove their `index.d.ts` we are waiting for this to be completed.

However, I included them because those are ultimately the people who contributed the types, with the exception of one that I corrected.
Totally, but do they realise that this would mean they will start receiving notifications for each issue/PR about these types on this repo?
Oh! I did not realize that, either. I can remove that then if that‚Äôs the best move?
Well, I've removed them. I guess they can be added later if necessary.

I always struggle with this header. The name makes it seem like it‚Äôs just an acknowledgement of who contributed, not that it has the side-effect of signing up as maintainer ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇ So yeah, I would err on the side of caution too. Perhaps let them know on the upstream PR that they can sign-up as maintainer here.
